alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:26PM CDT until May 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR EASTERN DAWES COUNTY... At 525 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Chadron Airport to 8 miles southwest of Ellsworth, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chadron, Red Cloud Campground, Chadron Airport, Chadron Campground and Chadron St Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
